DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Three Experimental Drugs Compared With Telaprevir ( Licensed Product ) People With Hepatitis C Virus Infection Who Have Not Had Treatment Before
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose study demonstrate treatment ABT-450/ritonavir ( r ) /ABT-267 ABT-333 administer without ribavirin ( RBV ) non-inferior efficacy compare treatment telaprevir pegylated interferon alpha-2a ( pegIFN ) RBV compare safety regimens treatment-naive hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) genotype ( GT ) 1a- 1b-infected adult .
